text: Tariq Mansoor (born 20 September, 1956 in India) is an Indian professor. He is currently the Vice-Chancellor of the Aligarh Muslim University in India since 17 May, 2017. He was previously a professor at the Jawaharlal Nehru Medical College, Aligarh in the Department of Surgery. == References == Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:Heads of universities and colleges in India Category: Uttar Pradesh academics
title: Tariq Mansoor
